"Jealousy can be a natural feeling, but it's important to remember that everyone has their own unique experiences and circumstances. Instead of focusing on others' accomplishments, try to focus on your own progress and celebrate your own successes."

"It's important to recognize that everyone has their own unique strengths and weaknesses. Just because someone finished a task seamlessly doesn't mean they didn't face their own challenges or put in the same amount of effort as you."
"Try to channel your jealousy into motivation. Instead of focusing on what others have achieved, focus on what you can achieve and set realistic goals for yourself."
"Remember that everyone has their own learning curve. Just because someone finished a task seamlessly doesn't mean they didn't have to learn and adapt in order to do it."
"It's important to be kind to yourself and recognize that everyone has their own journey. Instead of comparing yourself to others, focus on your own growth and progress."
